# AVPlayerLooper.Status.cancelled

**Case**

The app canceled looping on the player.

## Declaration

```swift
case cancelled
```

## Discussion

The system sets this status after you call the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVPlayerLooper/disableLooping()] method.

## Status values

- **AVPlayerLooper.Status.unknown**: The status isn’t known.
- **AVPlayerLooper.Status.ready**: The looper is ready to perform looping playback.
- **AVPlayerLooper.Status.failed**: The looper isn’t able to perform looping playback due to an error.
